headline: 10 Dividend Stocks That Look Better Than Bonds
summary: As Treasury yields fall, dividend stocks with higher payouts and room to maintain them are becoming an appealing bond alternative.

headline: MO Expands Smokeable Margins to 64% as Cigarette Volumes Fall 9%
summary: Altria widens smokeable margins despite falling cigarette volumes, powered by pricing strength and premium-brand resilience.

headline: Altria (MO): Assessing Valuation After Recent 3-Month Share Price Pullback
summary: Altria Group (MO) has quietly outperformed over the past 3 years, even as the stock slipped about 12% in the past 3 months. That mix of resilience and recent weakness is drawing fresh interest. See our latest analysis for Altria Group. Today’s $57.99 share price sits against a solid backdrop, with a double digit year to date share price return and a three year total shareholder return above 50%, suggesting long term income confidence even as near term momentum has cooled. If Altria’s mix of...

headline: Has The Market Pricing Of Altria Missed Its Cash Flow Strength In 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Altria Group is still a value play at around $57.99, or if the easy money has already been made, this article will walk you through what the numbers actually say. The stock has dipped slightly over the last week, down about 1.9%, and is roughly flat over 30 days, but it is still up 10.4% year to date and 11.4% over the last year, building on a 57.2% 3-year and 100.0% 5-year return. Those moves have come as investors continue to weigh Altria's long-term shift away...
